# File vendor/riddle/lib/riddle/client.rb, line 415
    def status
      response = Response.new request(
        :status, Message.new
      )
      
      rows, cols = response.next_int, response.next_int
      
      (0...rows).inject({}) do |hash, row|
        hash[response.next.to_sym] = response.next
        hash
      end
    end
